text.value:
This is a text dropdown with two select boxes.
Each select box uses the same choices:
afterWord - defines after which word the select box should be placed.br> correctChoiceNum - decides which choice is correct, and starts from zero

In paintings of the past, according to the art historian John Berger, “men act; women appear”. Looking at the evidence from this painting, which of the following statements do you consider to be most persuasive about the way in which Jane, Henry’s third wife, is presented?
